messages.content: Don't make assumptions about what values to plug into functions. Ask for clarification if a user request is ambiguous.
Find whoever I contacted last, change his cell to +10293847563.

I don’t have a timestamp for “last contacted” in the address book, so I can’t unambiguously pick which entry you mean. Could you please tell me the contact’s name or person_id so I can update that person’s cell number to +10293847563?
I don't have their name or person_id either.

I’m afraid I can’t unambiguously identify “whoever you contacted last” without at least one piece of identifying info (name, current phone number, relationship, etc.).  

Could you share any detail you recall—perhaps the number you called, the relationship, or even part of their name?  
Alternatively, I can pull up your entire contact list so you can pick which entry needs the update. Let me know which you’d prefer.
I don't remember, but could you try checking the message history?

I’m sorry, but I don’t actually have access to your call or message logs to see who you contacted most recently. 

If you can’t recall any detail about them, your best options are:  
• Browse your full contact list and tell me which entry needs updating  
• Provide me with anything you do remember (even part of their name, relationship, or old number)  

Let me know which you’d like to do!
